Saju Calculator Compatibility Guides About

Privacy Policy

Last updated: January 2026

Introduction

At Korean Saju Guide ("we," "our," or "us"), we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

Information We Collect

Information You Provide

When using our Saju Calculator or Compatibility tools, you may enter:

  • Birth date
  • Birth time (optional)
  • Sex/Gender (optional)
  • Timezone

Important: This information is processed entirely within your browser. We do NOT store, transmit, or have access to your personal birth data on any server. All calculations happen locally on your device.

Automatically Collected Information

Like most websites, we may automatically collect certain technical information when you visit our site:

  • IP address (anonymized where possible)
  • Browser type and version
  • Device type
  • Pages visited and time spent
  • Referring website

This information is collected through cookies and similar technologies for analytics purposes only.

How We Use Your Information

We use collected information to:

  • Improve our website and services
  • Analyze usage patterns and trends
  • Ensure website security
  • Respond to inquiries (if you contact us)

Cookies

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. For detailed information, please see our Cookie Policy.

Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services that collect information:

  • Google Analytics: For website traffic analysis
  • Google AdSense: For displaying advertisements (if applicable)

These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of your data.

Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

  • Access the personal data we hold about you
  • Request correction of inaccurate data
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Object to or restrict processing
  • Data portability

Since we don't store personal birth data, most of these rights relate only to any contact information you may have provided.

Children's Privacy

Our website is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

⚠️ Entertainment & Self-Reflection Only: The information provided on this site is for cultural education and entertainment purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical, legal, psychological, or financial advice.
